lines.text: I had that weird dream again.
You mean the one with the goat and the dwarf and the jar of peanut butter?
[Ed is examining Gonzo]
No nostrils. How do you smell?
Awful. Trust me, I'm his roommate.
[Miss Piggy runs by]
Is breakfast over?
No, why?
'Cause I think the bacon just ran out.
Okay, guys. It's up to us. We have to save Gonzo from a whole army of government agents.
Well, I have a joke book.
Drumsticks, drumsticks!
I have some loose jello, okay.
Okay. Well that settles that.
Forgive me my Earthly manners, but, uh, do you have any idea what it's like to be laughed at?
Yeah, sure I do.
To be called names, like 'wacko.'
Uh-huh.
And 'freak-boy.'
Oh, yeah.
And 'paranoid delusional psychopath'?
Got me there.
[Gonzo appears on live TV]
Hey, you better get down there, Kerm.
Relax. No one is going anywhere, okay?

[on TV]
You see, I was contacted through my breakfast cereal, and then it was confirmed to me by the Cosmic Fish that I am definitely from outer space.
So you want to go now, or wait for the commercial?
Now.
You tell him, and I will smack you. I will smack you like a bad, bad donkey, okay!
Rizzo?
No, it's Santa, but I forgot my reindeer.
Remember, I built this new Jacuzzi for my alien family, so please, no eating in the spa.
I wonder if there really is life on other planets?
What do you care? You don't have a life on this planet.
Gonzo, you've got it.
Sure wish we could find a cure for it.

[puts on glove]
May I?
I think before you answer that question you'd better be real clear on the final destination of that finger.
What? I cannot believe that little shrimp left us behind!
I am not a shrimp. I am a king prawn!
You know what you are, Gonzo?
What?
Distinct.
There is a menu correction, okay. We will now be serving baloney sandwiches.
[Swedish cook shouts something]
But, no bread.
R U There.
Are you sure it didn't say "you need help"?
Hey, Rizzo, come here! I think my Kap'n Alphabet is sending me a message.
Yeah, I know what you mean. I had some guacamole last night, and it's still speaking to me.
What are you, anyway?
Oh, uh, good question. Now technically speaking, uhh, let's say, put me down as a... 'Whatever'?
Hey, Kermit. When will you fix the oven, okay?
What's wrong with the oven?
[oven explodes]
That.
I'm an alien!
What, have you been tap-dancing on the barbecue again?
Well, it's just that I'm sick and tired of being a one-of-a-kind freak, that's all.
Gonzo, you are not a one-of-a-kind freak. You're a, uh... uh...
A whatever?
Well... yeah.
Rizzo?
Gonzo?
Kermy?
Piggy?
What is going on here?
Black belt, third degree.
Platinum belt, with an unlimited line of credit.
How you doin', Ed?
Well, I ain't dead.
They are coming to Earth, aren't they?
I don't know.
How many of them are there?
I don't know.
When will they be here? And don't you *dare* tell me that you don't know.
I know not?
He's one of us. And no matter what happens, no matter what obstacles we face, we NEVER forget one of our own.
I love it when you take charge.
Hey! We left Bunsen and Beaker back at the gas station.
Okay... Well, uh, from THIS point on , no matter what happens, we never forget one of our own.
Okay, guys. We've got to get through those doors.
Should we just ask permission from those nice men with the rifles?
[Pepe reappears in ballet costume]
La la la la lah laah. Lah!
Wow.
I should, uh, go change, okay?
Are you telling me we came out here in the middle of the night for a stupid egg?
Sh! It could be full of chocolate, okay.
Gonzo, by surviving and thriving on this alien planet, you have proven yourself audacious, courageous, and distinctly one-of-a-kind. We welcome you back with our most ceremonious of ceremonies.
What's that?
We gonna blow you up, baby.
Nah, Baby! Me and Gonzo are very tight. In fact, we're gonna be chillin' in our hot tub later on. Perhaps you'd like to partake in the partay?
Release me!
Hello, I'm Dr. Van Neuter. I'll be your brain surgeon today, if you don't mind. Ha! Get it? "Brain surgeon." "Mind." Hahaha!

[as Rizzo is hanging out the window]
Rizzo?
No, it's Santa. But I forgot my reindeer.

[after the 'Door in a Jar' forms but the door is too small]
Gee, that's disappointing.
Perfect. Somebody knock and see if Barbie's home.
Quick, somebody knock and see if Barbie's home!
We are not the same as you.
We are highly evolved beings. Now... uh, what was I saying?
We're going to pause here and we'll be right back with Gonzo, the Geek Who Fell to Earth.
I don't like the look of those guys. This rat smells a rat.

[to Gonzo]
The limo is right this way.
Did he say limo? Wait a second, I'm his translator. Hold up!
Come on, fellas. Take me to my leader.
How about this story? It's about a big, bad wolf and a little pig.
Um, that's three pigs, okay?
Not in this version.
Oh! A real story. Intrigue! Danger! New outfits! And it's mine, mine, mine, all mine, a ha ha ha ha... (to camera) Oh, come on, please, you think Ted Koppel never gets excited?
We feel your pain, Gonzo.
They feel my pain!
I've got a paper-cut that's a doozy. You feel my pain, too?
I've got great news! Gonzo has been kidnapped by the government and it could be a life-threatening situation!
How can that be great news?
Because, I've got a story, I've got a story! Oh! I need to change! Something that says journalistic integrity.

[on spy gadgets]
Ahah. The old rubber ducky with invisibility-spray trick. Check.
DON'T LAUGH AT MEEEEE!
I'm afraid we're going to have to perform an invasive quadrilobal brain probe on you and pluck it from your head.
The information?
No, your brain.
From this moment on, if I say you're hungry, you eat. If I say you're sleepy...
I eat?
What is he doing up there?
His breakfast cereal told him to sit up there.
Talk about whole grain and nuts.
Oh, boy, he fell on you like a ton of bricks, okay.
Feeling a little nervous, are we?
Of *course* I'm nervous.
Well, don't worry. Everyone is before having their brains sucked out.
Hello! What's a nice man like *you* doing in a guardhouse like *this*?
While they're warming up the brain-sucker for ya in surgery, I brought you a sandwich here, and I cut off the crusts for you.
Remember, if you experience any unpleasantness, please let me know. I would hate to miss it.
I'm gonna kill somebody.
Excuse me. Can this thing go any faster?
I'm doing *thirty.*
You backstabbing, underhanded little coffee-pig!
You're terminated.
Uhh, when you say 'terminated'...
You need help, Singer! *Find* some!
Now we can go meet my alien brothers at Cape Doom.
Uh, what makes you think that aliens are landing there, Gonzo?
Oh, a sandwich told me.
Midnight. The lone alien stands before a naked sky. The mood is tense. My hair looks *great.*
When we pull together, we can do anything.
This is Shelley Snipes. Please ignore the little sow.
So... you'll write?
Oh, yeah, sure I'll write. There's probably a mailbox every couple of light years.
Kermit, you're the best friend any alien could ask for.
Oh, hey Gonzo! I thought you were performing at a bar mitzvah?
No, I got the Electric Mayhem to cover for me.
Shalom!
[a guard sees Fozzie's hands, which he washed the invisibilty spray off]
YOU!... HANDS!... up?
What a great day.
Mm-hmm.
That was probably the best day of my whole life. There's just one thing I still don't understand.
What's that, Gonzo?
Why did they ask me to build a jacuzzi?
[snickering]
De prawn cracker wins!

[singing]
Jalapenos, jalapenos, gettin' my friend some jalapenos.

[Gonzo wakes up from a bad dream and sits upright, accidentally sending a hammock-sleeping Rizzo flying out the window]
I don't wanna be alone!
You're not alone.
Who said that?
Gee, I don't know. Maybe it's the rat who's hanging out of the window!
I have to go to the little bear's room.
People of Earth, do not be alarmed!
Oh brother.
Later.
Hello little people. What an absolutely splendid day.
What are you doing here?
I'm making contact. What are you doing?
Very, very moving, my little alien friend. But I'm afraid your timing is off. Now you're coming back with me in my c-cement truck.
I had that weird dream again.
The one with the goat and the dwarf and the jar of peanut butter?
